biz.pavonis.hexameter.api

Interface Hexagon

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HexagonImpl

    public interface Hexagon
extends java.io.Serializable

    Represents a Hexagon.

    Please note that all coordinates are relative to the HexagonalGrid containing this Hexagon.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getCenterX()
      Returns the center x coordinate of this Hexagon.
      double getCenterY()
      Returns the center y coordinate of this Hexagon.
      int getGridX()
      Returns this Hexagon's x coordinate on the HexagonalGrid.
      int getGridY()
      Returns this Hexagon's y coordinate on the HexagonalGrid.
      int getGridZ()
      Returns this Hexagon's z coordinate on the HexagonalGrid.
      Point[] getPoints()
      Returns an array containing the Points of this Hexagon.
      <T> T getSatelliteData()
      Returns the previously set satellite data from this Hexagon.
      <T> void setSatelliteData(T data)
      Can be used to add arbitrary satellite data to a Hexagon.

    • Method Detail

      • getPoints

        Point[] getPoints()
        Returns an array containing the Points of this Hexagon.
        Returns:
        points array

      • getGridX

        int getGridX()
        Returns this Hexagon's x coordinate on the HexagonalGrid.
        Returns:
        x coordinate on the grid

      • getGridY

        int getGridY()
        Returns this Hexagon's y coordinate on the HexagonalGrid. The Y coordinate is not present in the axial model but it is in the cube model. This method is just for convenience.
        Returns:
        y coordinate on the grid

      • getGridZ

        int getGridZ()
        Returns this Hexagon's z coordinate on the HexagonalGrid.
        Returns:
        z coordinate on the grid

      • getCenterX

        double getCenterX()
        Returns the center x coordinate of this Hexagon.
        Returns:
        center x

      • getCenterY

        double getCenterY()
        Returns the center y coordinate of this Hexagon.
        Returns:
        center y
